title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce platform with user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and payment integration. Built with modern web technologies for optimal performance.

title: Task Management App
description: A collaborative task management application featuring real-time updates, team workspaces, and progress tracking. Implements drag-and-drop functionality for intuitive task organization.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: An interactive weather dashboard that displays current conditions and forecasts using geolocation and weather APIs. Features beautiful data visualizations and responsive design.

title: Social Media Analytics
description: A comprehensive analytics dashboard for tracking social media metrics across multiple platforms. Includes data visualization, export functionality, and automated reporting.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing projects and skills. Features dark mode, smooth animations, and contact form with backend integration.

title: Chat Application
description: Real-time chat application with private messaging, group chats, and file sharing capabilities. Implements WebSocket for instant message delivery.
